title: Docker
summary: Containerization platform for deploying applications in isolated environments

title: Kubernetes
summary: Production-grade container orchestration platform for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.

title: Helm
summary: The package manager for Kubernetes that helps you define, install, and upgrade even the most complex applications.

title: Podman
summary: Daemonless container engine for developing, managing, and running OCI containers with enhanced security and rootless operation.

title: containerd
summary: Industry-standard container runtime that manages the complete container lifecycle for both Linux and Windows containers.

title: Amazon Web Services
summary: Comprehensive cloud computing platform offering scalable infrastructure, storage, databases, and hundreds of other services.

title: Microsoft Azure
summary: Microsoft's cloud computing platform providing a wide range of cloud services including compute, analytics, storage, and networking.

title: Google Cloud Platform
summary: Google's cloud computing services offering computing, data storage, data analytics, and machine learning capabilities.

title: DigitalOcean
summary: Cloud infrastructure provider focused on simplicity, offering droplets, managed databases, and Kubernetes services for developers.

title: Jenkins
summary: Open-source automation server for building, testing, and deploying software with extensive plugin ecosystem.

title: GitLab CI/CD
summary: Integrated continuous integration and deployment platform built into GitLab for automated testing and deployment pipelines.

title: GitHub Actions
summary: GitHub's integrated CI/CD platform for automating workflows, testing, and deployment directly from repositories.

title: Argo CD
summary: Declarative GitOps continuous delivery tool for Kubernetes applications with automated synchronization and rollback capabilities.

title: CircleCI
summary: Cloud-based continuous integration and delivery platform with powerful workflow automation and parallelization capabilities.

title: Spinnaker
summary: Multi-cloud continuous delivery platform for releasing software changes with high velocity and confidence across multiple cloud providers.

title: Ansible
summary: Agentless automation platform for configuration management, application deployment, and infrastructure orchestration.

title: Terraform
summary: Infrastructure as Code tool for building, changing, and versioning infrastructure safely and efficiently across multiple providers.

title: AWS CloudFormation
summary: AWS service for defining cloud infrastructure using templates, enabling version control and automated provisioning of resources.

title: Pulumi
summary: Modern infrastructure as code platform using familiar programming languages to define and manage cloud resources.

title: AWS CDK
summary: AWS Cloud Development Kit for defining cloud infrastructure using familiar programming languages and object-oriented concepts.

title: Chef
summary: Configuration management and automation platform for defining infrastructure as code using Ruby-based recipes and cookbooks.

title: Puppet
summary: Declarative configuration management tool for automating infrastructure provisioning and management across diverse environments.

title: HashiCorp Nomad
summary: Flexible workload orchestrator for deploying and managing applications across on-premise and cloud environments at scale.

title: HashiCorp Packer
summary: Tool for creating identical machine images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration, supporting immutable infrastructure.

title: HashiCorp Vagrant
summary: Tool for building and managing virtual machine environments in a single workflow, enabling consistent development environments.

title: Kustomize
summary: Kubernetes-native configuration management tool for customizing application configurations without modifying original YAML files.

title: Prometheus
summary: Open-source monitoring and alerting toolkit with time-series database for collecting and querying metrics from applications and infrastructure.

title: Grafana
summary: Multi-platform analytics and interactive visualization platform for creating dashboards and graphs from time series data.

title: ELK Stack
summary: Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana stack for centralized logging, log analysis, and visualization of application and infrastructure logs.

title: Jaeger
summary: Open-source distributed tracing platform for monitoring and troubleshooting microservices-based architectures.

title: Datadog
summary: Cloud-scale monitoring and analytics platform providing full-stack observability for applications, infrastructure, and logs.

title: New Relic
summary: Full-stack observability platform providing application performance monitoring, infrastructure monitoring, and digital intelligence.

title: Splunk
summary: Platform for searching, monitoring, and analyzing machine-generated data for operational intelligence and security insights.

title: Fluentd
summary: Open-source data collector for unified logging layer, enabling log collection, processing, and forwarding across distributed systems.

title: HashiCorp Vault
summary: Secrets management tool for securely storing and accessing tokens, passwords, certificates, and encryption keys.

title: Trivy
summary: Comprehensive security scanner for vulnerabilities in container images, file systems, and git repositories.

title: Falco
summary: Runtime security monitoring tool for detecting anomalous behavior and security threats in containerized environments.

title: Open Policy Agent
summary: Policy engine for cloud-native environments enabling unified policy enforcement across microservices, Kubernetes, and APIs.

title: Istio
summary: Service mesh platform providing traffic management, security, and observability for microservices without requiring application changes.

title: SonarQube
summary: Code quality platform for continuous inspection of code to detect bugs, vulnerabilities, and code smells across multiple programming languages.

title: Snyk
summary: Developer security platform for finding and fixing vulnerabilities in code, dependencies, containers, and infrastructure as code.

title: HashiCorp Consul
summary: Service mesh solution providing service discovery, configuration, and segmentation functionality for distributed applications.
